text: 3:25 Godɨn Araziba 10:17; Rom 2:11; Efesus 6:9; 1 Pita 1:17Ia fo, God gumazamizir vabara a men garir puvatɨ, a bar gumazamizibar gara men araziba ko navir averiaba deravɨra dar gara tuavir vamɨra me tuisɨsi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir arazir kurabagh amizim, a uan arazir kurar an amizim bagh ivezir kuram iniam.
